alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 21 at 2:02AM PDT until March 21 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Antelope Valley Foothills, Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
